Selected Work


These days, changing a career many times is common. But it can be scary, too. With millions of job titles and possibilities, it can even feel like there are too many options. Built by career-changers, Embark! is here to help you decide which direction to take.

This project is the design and font-end development for a tool geared towards career-changers who don’t know where to start. View Project




Deciding what to read next? What are your friends reading? Love lists? Want to know the best books of 2016? Get answers to these questions and more! Create your very own bookshelf and meet your next favourite book at Goodreads.com

This project is a redesign and development of the Goodreads web app for the user bookshelf or "my books" section of the website. View Project




You travel too much? Can never seem to take time out of your busy work schedule? Struggling with your banking needs? What if you could do it all from your phone!

This project is the design and prototyping of a fictional iOS online banking app called Branchless Bank. A one stop shop for user-friendly, secure and convenient mobile banking needs. View Project




The NC Museum of Natural Sciences is the largest institution of its kind in the Southeast and one of the nation’s most amazing museums about the natural world.

This project is the design and development of a website dedicated to showcasing one of the lesser known exhibits “Treasures UNEARTHED”, to commemorate the 140th anniversary of the museum. View Project




A design challenge seemed like the perfect way to shapen my design and illustration skills.

I chose North Carolina as my inspiration and theme as this state has been my home for the last twelve years. North Carolina is so vibrant, diverse and beautiful in every aspect, and this is what I've tried to convey in each illustration. View Gallery
